item.title: Security policy
item.description: Security Policy Obviously, PrestaShop project security is a critical matter. PrestaShop teams are dedicated to keep a high level of security in every aspects of the software. However a software without vulnerability does not exist, which is why there is a security report process. If you find a security issue, please follow it to responsibly disclose your findings. Reporting a Vulnerability Security issues can be reported by sending an email to security@prestashop.
